content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2022 MLB All-Star Packages

As baseball fans gather at the beloved Midsummer Classic to display their loyalty to their favorite team and sport, Roadtrips’ guests will be treated to their very own all-star treatment. Our custom-crafted MLB All-Star travel packages are yours to personalize with great hotels in L.A., your preferred tickets at Dodger Stadium, tickets to Workout Day, the Home Run Derby, The Futures Game, the Legends & Celebrity Softball Game and more. Our Sports Travel Specialists will work collaboratively with you to create your ultimate 2022 MLB All-Star experience.

Join us and all the hype that goes along with this exciting event. Complete 2022 MLB All-Star Game packages are available from $2,545 per person (based on double occupancy).

About the 2022 MLB All-Star Game

Summer just isn’t summer without the MLB All-Star Game. For baseball fans, it’s such an important part of the season that it’s become known as the Midsummer Classic. In 2022, the best baseball players in the world will converge in Los Angeles for a fun-filled few days of everything baseball. This will mark the third time Los Angeles has hosted the MLB All-star Game (they last hosted in 1980).

Those visiting L.A. for the MLB All-Star festivities can enjoy a number of events. FanFest runs Friday through Tuesday. Sunday brings both the Futures Game, featuring the top Minor League prospects, as well as the Legends & Celebrity Softball Game. On Monday, Workout Day featuring the Home Run Derby is always a fan favorite and the event is capped off by the 92nd MLB All-Star Game on Tuesday, July 19th.
